Personalized Electric Toothbrush with AI Technology: Create an electric toothbrush with an AI-powered toothbrush head that can detect the user's brushing patterns and adjust its motion accordingly. The toothbrush can also track the user's oral health and provide personalized recommendations for improvement. Additionally, the toothbrush can be connected to a mobile app that provides real-time feedback and coaching to help users brush their teeth more effectively.

Smart Toothbrush with Augmented Reality: Design an electric toothbrush that includes an augmented reality (AR) display. The display can show animated characters or educational content that encourages children to brush their teeth for the full recommended 2 minutes. The AR display can also provide real-time feedback on brushing technique, helping users improve their brushing skills.

Portable and Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Built-in Water Flosser: Create an electric toothbrush that includes a built-in water flosser for a more thorough cleaning experience. The toothbrush can be easily portable and rechargeable, making it perfect for travel or for people who want to maintain good oral hygiene on-the-go.

Personalized Electric Toothbrush with Customizable Bristle Hardness: Design an electric toothbrush that allows users to customize the bristle hardness to their preference. The toothbrush can include a unique bristle design that provides a gentle cleaning experience for sensitive teeth and gums, while still providing effective cleaning.

Electric Toothbrush with Anti-Bacterial Technology: Create an electric toothbrush that includes anti-bacterial technology to help prevent the growth of harmful bacteria on the toothbrush. The toothbrush can be designed with a unique bristle coating or a built-in UV sanitizer to kill bacteria and germs. This can help users maintain a healthier oral environment and reduce the risk of oral infections.
